biotools.summary: Systems Metabolomics using Interpretable Learning and Evolution (SMILE) is a framework for for supervised metabolomics data analysis. SMILE package implements Linear Genetic Programming (LGP) algorithm in python, with a scikit-learn style API. It is mainly used in data mining and finding feature interactions. Note it currently only support binary classification data.
